briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of an Investigational Zoster Vaccine In Subjects With a History of Varicella (Chickenpox)(V211-010)(COMPLETED)

armGroups.label: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) refrigerated formulation
interventionNames: Biological: Comparator: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) refrigerated formulation

armGroups.label: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) frozen formulation
interventionNames: Biological: Comparator: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) frozen formulation

interventions.name: Comparator: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) refrigerated formulation
Comparator: zoster vaccine live (Oka/Merck) frozen formulation

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Individuals who are at least 50 years of age or older with a history of varicella (chicken pox)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior history of herpes zoster (shingles)
* Prior receipt of varicella or zoster vaccine
* Immunosuppressed

outcomeMeasures.title: Geometric Mean Titer (GMT) of Varicella-zoster Virus (VZV) Antibody Responses at 4 Weeks Postvaccination
outcomeMeasures.description: The GMT of the VZV-specific antibody responses as measured by gpELISA (glycoprotein enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay) at 4 weeks postvaccination in subjects who received ZOSTAVAX™ with PGSU and in subjects who received ZOSTAVAX™ with PGS.

outcomeMeasures.title: Vaccine-Related Serious Adverse Experiences (SAEs) for 28 Days Postvaccination
outcomeMeasures.description: Vaccine-related (as assessed by an investigator who is a qualified physician according to his/her best clinical judgment) serious adverse experiences are any AEs occurring at any dose that; Results in death; or Is life threatening; or Results in a persistent or significant disability/incapacity; or Results in or prolongs an existing inpatient hospitalization; or Is a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or Is a cancer; or Is an overdose

outcomeMeasures.title: Geometric Mean Fold Rise (GMFR) in VZV Antibody Titers From Prevaccination to 4 Weeks Postvaccination
outcomeMeasures.description: GMFR of the VZV antibody response from prevaccination to Week 4 postvaccination
